This is a list of publications by lab members, with a curated sample of [figures]{style="background-color: #FFFF00; padding-left: 0.2rem; padding-right: 0.2rem;border-radius: 0.3rem;"} to illustrate the diversity of research in our lab. See the [Agriculture](projects_agriculture.qmd), [Biodiversity](projects_biodiversity.qmd), and [Conservation](projects_conservation.qmd) pages for a topic-based review of our research.

Graduate and undergraduate students, postdocs, technicians, and research associates who worked in the lab are [in red]{.trainee-highlight}. Lab PIs are [in black]{.textual-bold}.

Can't access these? Send an email to [Paul Galpern](pgalpern.qmd).
